about_the_game:
Ever wanted to have good looking big icons to use on your project events, or even with your custom script? This is exactly what you need! A collection of 37 "High Resolution Crafted" icons, for you, to make you game look even more fancy! This time, "Buffs and Debuffs" themed.

Features:

- 37 icons/pictures in 1024x1024 resolution.
- A variety of Buffs: Shield, HP Regen, MP Regen, Floating and more...
- A variety of Debuffs: Bleeding, Poison, No Vision, Sleep, and more...
- Status and Transformations: Zombified, Ghost, Bersek and more...
- Single versions (individual icons per file) and Iconset (all files combined into one) included!

List of icons:

- ATK Up, ATK Down, DEF Up, DEF Down, LCK Up, LCK Down, MAG ATK Up, MAG ATK Down, MAG DEF Up, MAG DEF Down, SPD Up, SPD Down.
- Poison, Bleeding, No Vision, Fear, K.O, No Magic, Silence, Paralyzed, Sleeping, "Buff", "Debuff", Charm, Reverse, Bersek, Confusion, Fracture, No Cure.
- Floating, Shield, Stinky, Ghost, Zombified, HP Regen, Mana Regen, TP Regen

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in Visual Novel Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
